description: Finally a good candid upskirt LoRAThis LoRA is capable of creating very realistic pictures around the candid upskirt topic. It can be used for inpainting too. Candid upskirts are those specific moments where a person flashes their undies being unaware of it. It is quite versatile, so you will get plenty of good results on very different scenarios (see samples).This LoRA has been trained using a high quality dataset on a realistic model, although it's been proven to work on cartoon models as well. Please check the generation parameters below.It has been trained on three different types of clothing: dresses, skirts and denim skirts.Example prompts:upskirt, girl seated on a sofa wearing a denim skirt <lora:upskirtAI:1>cinematic photo girl sitting on a couch, long brunette hair with (blonde highlights:0.7), wearing a miniskirt, at a photobooth, boots, at a, 35mm photograph, film, bokeh, professional, 4k, highly detailed, upskirt, <lora:upskirtAI:0.9>photography by by Bill Brandt, Wearing a short Dress,At a cinema, seated, rock n roll, from the front, simple background, <lora:upskirtAI:0.8>upskirt, two girls seated in the bedroom wearing a denim skirt <lora:upskirtAI:1>, high resolution, detailed, cinematic, contrastExample negative prompt:BadDream, UnrealisticDream  Generation parameters:CFG works best at 7The LoRA intensity should be set somewhere between 0.5 and 0.9. It works best with realistic models (Analog Madness, Realistic Vision, EpicRealism, etc.)It can be used for inpaintingAlthough it's not necessary, you can use the trigger word upskirt if the prompt you're using is too long or complicated.
